source.name: Unearthed Arcana: Cleric, Druid, and Wizard
source.author: Wizards of the Coast
source.description: Three classes each receive a playtest option this week. The cleric receives a new Divine Domain option: the Twilight Domain. The druid gains a new Druid Circle option: the Circle of Wildfire. And the wizard gains a new Arcane Tradition feature: Onomancy, the magic of true names.
